text: Smarana kara, tomara yakhana uparera (paharera) dike chutachile ebam pichana phire karo prati laksya karachile na, ara rasula tomaderake pichana dika theke dakachilena. Phale tini tomaderake bipadera upara bipada dilena [1], yate tomara ya hariyecha ebam ye bipada tomadera upara eseche tara jan'ya tomara duhkhita na ha'o. Ara tomara ya kara allaha ta bisesabhabe abahita
